book:genre.name: Mixed Collection
book:genre.book:description: A curated selection of fiction, thriller, horror, sci-fi, and romance titles from iconic and modern authors.

book:item.book:title: Gone Girl
book:item.book:author: Gillian Flynn
book:item.book:summary: A suspenseful psychological thriller where a husband becomes the prime suspect after his wife mysteriously disappears.

book:item.book:title: Dracula
book:item.book:author: Bram Stoker
book:item.book:summary: The Gothic classic that defined vampire fiction, following the iconic Count Dracula’s arrival in England.

book:item.book:author: George Orwell
book:item.book:summary: A chilling dystopian novel about surveillance, oppression, and rebellion in a totalitarian regime.

book:item.book:title: It
book:item.book:author: Stephen King
book:item.book:summary: A group of children confront an ancient evil that emerges every 27 years in their small town — and again as adults.

book:item.book:title: Me Before You
book:item.book:author: Jojo Moyes
book:item.book:summary: A life-affirming love story between a quirky caretaker and a man paralyzed after an accident.

book:item.book:title: Before I Go To Sleep
book:item.book:author: S.J Watson
book:item.book:summary: A psychological mystery where a woman wakes up every day with no memory of her life.

book:item.book:title: White Nights
book:item.book:author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
book:item.book:summary: A melancholic tale of fleeting love and loneliness set under the white nights of St. Petersburg.

book:item.book:title: The Martian
book:item.book:author: Andy Weir
book:item.book:summary: Stranded on Mars, astronaut Mark Watney must use science and wit to survive and signal Earth.

book:item.book:title: Frankenstein
book:item.book:author: Mary Shelley
book:item.book:summary: The original tale of man playing god, and the tragic consequences of Dr. Frankenstein’s scientific ambition.

book:item.book:title: All The Light We Cannot See
book:item.book:author: Anthony Doerr
book:item.book:summary: A WWII story of intersecting lives: a blind French girl and a German boy bound by fate and light.
